Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.general.common.impl.security.ApplicationAuthenticationProvider
    As of bug-fix release 2.1.2 the authentication mechanism changes. It is now based upon custom implementations of UserDetailsService in combination with WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter. For further information have a look at the sample application.

  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.salesmanagement.service.api.rest.SalesmanagementRestService.createOrderPosition(OfferEto, long, String)
    not REST style, will be removed.
    io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.salesmanagement.service.impl.rest.SalesmanagementRestServiceImpl.createOrderPosition(OfferEto, long, String)

    io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.offermanagement.service.api.rest.OffermanagementRestService.getAllDrinks()
